about_the_game:
“DO OR DIE – Hunt To Survive” presents an action-packed multiplayer game with a focus on competitive gameplay and diverse game modes. The primary objective is to connect players on a server and client to engage in intense battles within a give time limit, using various weapons to earn high scores and emerge as the winner. The game allows both solo and team-based play, with up to 8 players connecting to a match.

The game features three different type of maps, each offering unique game-play experiences:
Free For All:
In this mode, all players are connected individually, and their scores are tracked separately. Players spawn at different locations with default weapons. The objective is to fight against each other, acquiring weapons from the environment, and scoring points by eliminating opponents. The addition of buffs adds depth and excitement to the gameplay, and players re-spawn with different locations upon death.

Team Death Match:
Players are divided into two teams automatically, namely the “Red Team” and the “Blue Team.” If there are four players connected, each team will have two players. The teams compete against each other, and the player’s objective is to work with their team members to defeat the opposing team. Upon death, players re-spawn at their team’s locations.

Sword Capture:
Similar to Team Death Match, this game mode introduces a scoring system based on capturing the enemy team’s sword and bringing it to their team’s sword table. The team with the most points at the end of the match wins. Players must defend their own sword while attempting to capture the enemy team’s sword.

The game boasts breathtaking visuals, interesting gameplay effects, and stylized game modes, encouraging players to engage in winning streaks and experience an energetic and thrilling gaming experience. Players can compete with friends and others, enhancing the competitive spirit of “DO OR DIE – Hunt To Survive”
Overall, the game seems to offer a balanced mix of fast-paced action, strategic gameplay, and teamwork, making it an exciting prospect for players seeking an adrenaline-fueled multiplayer shooter experience.

No In-game Purchases and Micro Transactions.

Follow us on Discord:

name: DO_OR_DIE Hunt to Survive

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 and 11
  • Processor: 2 GHZ or Faster Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 and 11
  • Processor: 2 GHZ or Faster Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Keyboard and Mouse

short_description: The concept of "DO OR DIE – Hunt To Survive" revolves around intense player elimination, diverse weaponry, and buffs, with a primary objective of achieving high scores within a given time limit. The game features three distinct game modes, each offering a unique gameplay experience.
